sample.name: Micro Focus Unit Testing Framework (MFUnit) Examples

overview.heading: Overview
overview.description: This set of examples demonstrates some of the capabilities of Micro Focus Unit Testing Framework. See the topic "Micro Focus Unit Testing Framework" in the Documentation included with this product.

step.description: How to Run the Demonstration in the Visual COBOL or Enterprise Developer IDE

steps.step: File -> Import -> Existing project into workspace
Run -> Run As -> COBOL Unit Test
